statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.ButtonName , AA.ButtonType , BB.Name as ButtonTypeName , AA.Instance , AA.UseYn , AA.Description
FROM dbo.AAButton AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.ACCode BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ButtonType = BB.Code AND BB.ParentCode = 'ButtonType' WHERE 1=1
AND ( AA.ButtonName LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.Instance LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' )
ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName , AA.ButtonName , AA.ButtonType , AA.Instance , AA.UseYn , AA.Description FROM dbo.AAButton AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.AAButton ( CreateDate, CreateBy, CreateByName, ButtonName, ButtonType, Instance, UseYn, Description ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreateBy#, #CreateByName#, #ButtonName#, #ButtonType#, #Instance#, #UseYn#, #Description# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.AAButton SET UpdateDate = GetDate() , UpdateBy = #UpdateBy# , UpdateByName= #UpdateByName#
, ButtonName = #ButtonName# , ButtonType = #ButtonType# , Instance = #Instance# , UseYn = #UseYn# , Description = #Description# WHERE ID = #ID#
